localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
blogPost.body: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
blogPost.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Keka希望成为一个易于使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，并且非常强大。而它也确实如此。你可以压缩所有常见（和不常见）格式的文件，并解压几乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
Keka希望成爲一個易於使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，並且非常強大。而它也確實如此。你可以壓縮所有常見（和不常見）格式的文件，並解壓幾乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。

next.excerpt: Drink Map is a small app that helps you log the places in which you have drunk. By pressing the only real button available, "Raise the jug", you'll mark your location. Learn a new fact every time you use the app on the DID YOU KNOW? section!
next.title: Drink Map - Mark places where you have drunk

localize.description: 饮酒地图是一款能帮你记录喝酒的地方的小程序。按下唯一一个真实的按钮 "举杯"，你就会标记你的位置。在DID YOU KNOW栏目中，每次使用该应用都能了解到一个新的事实!
飲酒地圖是一款能幫你記錄喝酒的地方的小程序。按下唯一一個真實的按鈕 "舉杯"，你就會標記你的位置。在DID YOU KNOW欄目中，每次使用該應用都能瞭解到一個新的事實!
